name: Eldritch Skylines
description:
Hail, Your Dread Majesty! You are an eldritch abomination seeking souls for sacrifice. Raise a city and attract a major population before the storm comes and sacrifices the innocent inhabitants to grow your power.

Initial goal that didn't make it in:
After the storm, you can build on top of the ruins of your old city for extra bonuses and effects to attract more souls.

Download the standalone build for less tears.

Credits:
